AbsoluteKnockout.name: Absolute Knockout
AbsoluteKnockout.desc: An upgrade to RapidTornado. This one performs eight sweeps in a clockwise, blur-like motion.

NeoWolfFangFist.name: Neo Wolf Fang Fist
NeoWolfFangFist.desc: A move from Yamcha himself, but you'd probably live long enough to actually use it, lmfao. Use your fists to strike the opponent and send them back with a mighty finishing punch

Tsuda.name: Tsuda
Tsuda.desc: An assassination technique that damages bones and internal organs without breaking the skin

MillionKick.name: Million Kick
MillionKick.desc: Focus your power in a lightning-fast flurry of kicks! Your enemy stands no chance!

BlurKicks.name: Blur Kicks
BlurKicks.desc: The user whips out their legs to an enemy's face to rapidly kick 6 times, causing a blur around the user's bottom limbs.

AwakenSlap.name: Awaken Slap
AwakenSlap.desc: A bold slap to one foe's face in an attempt to wake them up.

PissedFist.name: Pissed Fist
PissedFist.desc: The user attacks multiple targets with a furious flurry of punches

LuckyPunch.name: LuckyPunch
LuckyPunch.desc: Deals miniscule strike damage to one foe, but has a high critical hit chance in return.

ElectronicArts.name: ElectronicArts
ElectronicArts.desc: bank transfer me 1000000000000000000000000000000.69 money to use this attack once

DoubleHit.name: DoubleHit
DoubleHit.desc: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

CollapsingKicks.name: Collapsing Kicks
CollapsingKicks.desc: A skill from a certain human girl who's great at martial arts. The user performs a series of strong kicks at the target.

TornadoSpin.name: Tornado Spin
TornadoSpin.desc: The user spins, arms extended, hitting all foes twice.

Chase.name: Chase
Chase.desc: Let multiple Grassimps chase after your foes.

TwinklePunch.name: TwinklePunch
TwinklePunch.desc: The user punches the foe lightly. This skill has a high chance to be a critical hit.

RapidTornado.name: RapidTornado
RapidTornado.desc: An upgrade to Cool Breakdance. This one performs four sweeps in a clockwise motion.

Cometfall.name: Cometfall
Cometfall.desc: The opposing team is bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

Cometdrop.name: Cometdrop
Cometdrop.desc: The target is bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

BraveSlap.name: Brave Slap
BraveSlap.desc: The user uses the power of their bravery to deliver a slap. Critical hits land more easily.

HystericalSlap.name: Hysterical Slap
HystericalSlap.desc: The user slaps the foe hard on the head. This may also inflict Dizziness.

BoneToss.name: Bone Toss
BoneToss.desc: The user tosses the bone it holds. The bone then returns to the user. This attack hits twice, once when thrown and once when returning. This skill has a higher chance to land as a critical hit.

KillRush.name: Kill Rush
KillRush.desc: The user strikes the foe 3 times to deal damage.

SwiftStrike.name: SwiftStrike
SwiftStrike.desc: The user strikes the foes 3 times to deal damage.

AngerHit.name: Anger Hit
AngerHit.desc: Guaranteed critical hit to one enemy, but 50% accuracy.

MightyHit.name: Mighty Hit
MightyHit.desc: Guaranteed critical hit to one enemy.

WindmillKick.name: WindmillKick
WindmillKick.desc: The target kicks the foe three times in quick motion

PawPunch.name: Paw Punch
PawPunch.desc: The user runs up to the target, and punches them.

SwiftSweep.name: Swift Sweep
SwiftSweep.desc: Self-explanatory. It is a swift sweep that knocks down an opponent unexpectedly to the ground.

Maso.name: Maso
Maso.desc: A painful method of buffing the user's own ATK.

LonePunch.name: LonePunch
LonePunch.desc: A declarative strike that gets 50% stronger when the user is the last one standing, or is alone.

ViseGrip.name: Vise Grip
ViseGrip.desc: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

MiraclePunch.name: MiraclePunch
MiraclePunch.desc: Deals medium-light strike damage to one foe, but has a high critical hit chance.

MiracleRush.name: MiracleRush
MiracleRush.desc: Deals medium-light strike damage to all foes, but has a high critical hit chance.

CoolBreakdance.name: CoolBreakdance
CoolBreakdance.desc: An upgrade to Swift Sweep. This one performs two sweeps in a breakdance-like motion.

WingAttack.name: Wing Attack
WingAttack.desc: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

VacuumWave.name: Vacuum Wave
VacuumWave.desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target.

Abise-geri.name: Abise-geri
Abise-geri.desc: This technique entails quickly appearing behind the target and dashing back into position while tripping the enemy

DualWingbeat.name: DualWingbeat
DualWingbeat.desc: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

Agneyastra.name: Agneyastra
Agneyastra.desc: The user discharges a weapon of mass damage, hitting all foes 3 times.

BoneRush.name: Bone Rush
BoneRush.desc: The user strikes twice with a held bone. There is a low chance to inflict dizziness with this attack.

HomingAttack.name: Homing Attack
HomingAttack.desc: When performing the Homing Attack, the user first targets a foe or object from midair. The user then curls into a spinball and launches straight into the target. After hitting, the attack's force will cause the user to bounce off the target.

Headbutt.name: Headbutt
Headbutt.desc: The user charges towards the foe, and lunges at them to attack using their head.

DedicationStrike.name: Dedication Strike
DedicationStrike.desc: The user uses the power of their dedication to strike the target. Critical hits land more easily.

WolfFangFist.name: Wolf-Fang Fist
WolfFangFist.desc: The user channels Wolf-like energy into their fists, punching the enemy in a three hit combo.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.desc: Inflicts HP-dependant Strike damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times

Meteorfall.name: Meteorfall
Meteorfall.desc: The opposing team is strongly bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

Meteordrop.name: Meteordrop
Meteordrop.desc: The target is strongly bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

Feint.name: Feint
Feint.desc: The user fakes out the target, before bypassing their defenses and sucker punching them in their blindspot. This skill bypasses Protect skills like Protect, Makarakarn, Tetrakarn & Web Trap.

MusclePunch.name: Muscle Punch
MusclePunch.desc: Inflicts Strike endurance-dependent damage on a single enemy.

AgileStrike.name: AgileStrike
AgileStrike.desc: The user strikes at a high speed. Damage is dependant on Agility.

FurDriver.name: Fur Driver
FurDriver.desc: A trail of leaves follows behind the user as they charge toward the target, and then sucker punches them.

ShadowChop.name: Shadow Chop
ShadowChop.desc: The user attacks the opponent with a chop of with excessive force. This skill has a high chance to be a critical hit.

SoloStrike.name: SoloStrike
SoloStrike.desc: A declarative strike that gets 50% stronger when the user is the last one standing, or is alone.

Sunfall.name: Sunfall
Sunfall.desc: The opposing team is heavily bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

Sundrop.name: Sundrop
Sundrop.desc: The target is heavily bashed, of which also lowers their Attack.

Stardrop.name: Stardrop
Stardrop.desc: A forceful bash that lowers the opponent's endurance.

Deathbound(S).name: Deathbound (S)
Deathbound(S).desc: Inflicts heavy HP-dependant Strike damage on random targets. Hits 2-5 times

AggressionBash.name: AggressionBash
AggressionBash.desc: The user puts their own Ego into this attack, possibly making the targeted person also getting some Ego 1/4th of the time.

DeterminationPunch.name: Determination Punch
DeterminationPunch.desc: The user uses the power of their determination to deliver a strong punch. Critical hits land more easily.

RockPunch.name: Rock Punch
RockPunch.desc: A skill from a certain human girl who's great at martial arts. The user punches the target with force great enough to shatter boulders.

ExplodingKnee.name: Exploding Knee
ExplodingKnee.desc: A skill from a certain human girl who's great at martial arts.

TanukiFist.name: Tanuki Fist
TanukiFist.desc: The user seemingly disappears with leaves falling from where the user once was, before reappearing in front of the target and driving their fist into them.

LonelyCrash.name: LonelyCrash
LonelyCrash.desc: A declarative strike that gets 50% stronger when the user is the last one standing, or is alone.

Last-Resort.name: Last Resort [Pkmn]
Last-Resort.desc: The user uses this as a last resort skill. Requires less than 40% of the user's current MP to use. This skill cannot miss.

Fracture.name: Fracture(Rain)
Fracture.desc: The strongest Technique in Lamonka, as of 19/02/2022. In that game, it is exclusive to the Physical type Main Character, or MC.

TricksterStrike.name: Trickster Strike
TricksterStrike.desc: The user uses trickery and misdirection to bypass the target's defenses and fatally strike them. This attack bypasses defensive skills like Shields, Magic Barriers, and Traps.

SolitarySlug.name: SolitarySlug
SolitarySlug.desc: A declarative strike that gets 50% stronger when the user is the last one standing, or is alone.

StrikeOfFury.name: Strike of Fury
StrikeOfFury.desc: The user, in a state of rage, launches towards the foe to deliver a heavy punch in retaliation for an ally.

IllusionForce.name: IllusionForce
IllusionForce.desc: The user creates an illusion of themselves, using it as a distraction to charge in and heavily smash their fist into the target. This skill bypasses defensive skills like Shields, Magic Barriers, and Traps.

PhantasmicKiller.name: Phantasmic Killer
PhantasmicKiller.desc: The user holds up a spell card, of which causes an endless surge of knives to start orbiting around the user, and then fly towards the opposing side, covering them in a tsunami of blades.

Fastclaws.name: Fastclaws
Fastclaws.desc: Rapid weak attack with the intent of inflicting bleed status to an objective, can only be performed by creatures or people with claws, be it biological or artifical

TempestExcalibur.name: Tempest Excalibur
TempestExcalibur.desc: The user points their sword to the sky and channels their energy into their blade, then proceeds to lunge toward the target and slash at them from all sides, and deal the final strike as an overhead slice.

StormBlade.name: Storm Blade
StormBlade.desc: The user performs a mystical set of sword slashes to deal damage.

MaelstromSword.name: Maelstrom Sword
MaelstromSword.desc: The user performs a mesmerizing set of sword slashes.

SpinSlash.name: Spin Slash
SpinSlash.desc: It inflicts damage on all foes surrounding the user.

FlurrySlice.name: FlurrySlice
FlurrySlice.desc: The user performs a skillful set of sword slashes.

Tri-Slash.name: Tri-Slash
Tri-Slash.desc: The user performs a set of sword slashes.

HassouTobi(R).name: Hassou Tobi (R)
HassouTobi(R).desc: An incomplete version of this skill that inflicts light Slash damage 8 times on random enemies

3CutShock.name: 3-Cut Shock
3CutShock.desc: The user sends out three consecutive slash shockwaves with their own scythe, dealing damage to the target.

VShine.name: V Shine
VShine.desc: The user slashes downwards and then upwards in a V pattern

TwinSlash.name: Twin Slash
TwinSlash.desc: The user slashes at the opponent two times in quick succession.

DemoralisingCutV.name: Demoralising Cut V

AgileSlash.name: Agile Slash

XSlash.name: X Slash
XSlash.desc: Slashes twice making a X shaped wound in the opponent

HurricaneSlash.name: Hurricane Slash
HurricaneSlash.desc: The user spins around with their weapon pointed outward.

UnseenSlashes.name: Unseen Slashes

QuickSlash.name: Quick Slash
QuickSlash.desc: The user slashes the enemy twice at quick speed.

WideSlash.name: Wide Slash
WideSlash.desc: The user slashes in a wide arc to damage the opposing team.

TornadoSlash.name: Tornado Slash
TornadoSlash.desc: The uses slashes in a tornado-like fashion.

HaloBump.name: Halo Bump

GrandHaloBlade.name: Grand Halo Blade

BrutalHit.name: Brutal Hit
BrutalHit.desc: Inflicts moderate HP-dependent Slash damage on one enemy

Hassohappa.name: Hassohappa
Hassohappa.desc: Inflicts moderate HP-dependent Slash damage on all enemies

GreatSlash.name: Great Slash
GreatSlash.desc: The user puts all their power into one strong slash.

NimbleSlit.name: NimbleSlit

Deathbound.name: Deathbound
Deathbound.desc: The user releases a barrage of slashes toward the opposing side, hitting them twice with a moderate chance of inflicting bleeding.

CrossSlash.name: Cross Slash
CrossSlash.desc: The user slashes the foe in a cross motion. This skill can inflict bleeding.

SupremeSlash.name: Supreme Slash
SupremeSlash.desc: The user puts all their power into one large slash. There is a high chance of inflicting bleed here.

DragoCut.name: Drago Cut
DragoCut.desc: A basic move of all types of dragons. A lower class slash skill using the wings to attack a foe, and can cause bleeding 1/20th of the time fue to the sharp edges or points on the wing.

WindSlicer.name: Wind Slicer

DeathSlice.name: Death Slice
DeathSlice.desc: The user slices the foe's with their scythe, may cut their head off.

RandomSlash.name: RandomSlash

AcrobaticGash.name: AcrobaticGash

SwordMania.name: Sword Mania

DeftBackslash.name: DeftBackslash

Hyper-Shot.name: Hyper-Shot

ZaMinigan.name: Za Minigan

ZaGan.name: Za Gan
ZaGan.desc: The user fires a weapon 7 times in quick succession. It has very poor accuracy.

ImperialMarksmanship.name: Imperial Marksmanship

LuckyBite.name: Lucky Bite
LuckyBite.desc: Deals miniscule pierce damage to one foe, but has a high critical hit chance in return.

CrystalShots.name: Crystal Shots
CrystalShots.desc: The user shoots 3 sharp gems at the foe.

BrainNibble.name: BrainNibble
BrainNibble.desc: The user aims a bite at the foe's head with a low chance to inflict confusion

Lick.name: Lick
Lick.desc: Miniscule Pierce damage to one foe, but high chance to paralyse them.

Poke.name: Poke
Poke.desc: The user uses a sharp object to attack the target. May inflict Bleed.

BigMunch.name: Big Munch
BigMunch.desc: The user bites into their target. This has a chance to cause bleeding.

MiracleBite.name: Miracle Bite
MiracleBite.desc: Deals medium-light pierce damage to one foe, but has a high critical hit chance.

StarThrust.name: StarThrust

SharpChomp-I.name: SharpChomp-I

ProngedThrust.name: ProngedThrust

2ProngedThrust.name: 2-Pronged Thrust

SharpChomp-II.name: SharpChomp-II

BrainSnap.name: BrainSnap

SharpChomp-III.name: SharpChomp-III

CorkShot.name: CorkShot

HardBite.name: Hard Bite

WolfBite.name: WolfBite

JewelDrill.name: Jewel Drill

AssaultShot.name: Assault Shot
AssaultShot.desc: A sharp object strikes the foe to deal medium pierce damage.

PointedStrike.name: Pointed Strike

CruelAttack.name: Cruel Attack

Shuriken.name: Shuriken

SuperGnaw.name: Super Gnaw

CruelAssault.name: Cruel Assault

BrainBite.name: Brain Bite
BrainBite.desc: The user aims a bite at the foe's head with a low chance to inflict confusion

HeavyShot.name: Heavy Shot
HeavyShot.desc: A sharp object strikes the foe to deal heavy pierce damage.

TridentStrike.name: Trident Strike
TridentStrike.desc: The user uses their trident to strike the foe. This skill has a small chance to inflict Bleed.

Stab.name: Stab

SilkStrike.name: SilkStrike

RapierStrike.name: Rapier Strike

MegaChomp.name: Mega Chomp
MegaChomp.desc: The user harshly bites into their target. This has a chance to cause bleeding.

Pralaya.name: Pralaya
Pralaya.desc: A sharp object strikes the foe to deal severe pierce damage.

HyperCrunch.name: Hyper Crunch
HyperCrunch.desc: The user very harshly bites into their target. This has a chance to cause bleeding.

WandOfFireBlast.name: Wand of FireBlast

EAgi.name: EAgi
EAgi.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal light Fire damage

MarEAgi.name: MarEAgi
MarEAgi.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal multiple light Fire damage

FieryFastball.name: Fiery Fastball

EAgiverse.name: EAgiverse

Ralagi.name: Ralagi

FlameCurse.name: Flame Curse
FlameCurse.desc: Weak fire skill with very high burn chance.

EAgilao.name: EAgilao

MarEAgion.name: MarEAgion
MarEAgion.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal multiple medium Fire damage

PSIFire-Alpha.name: PSIFire-Alpha
PSIFire-Alpha.desc: Fire bursts from the user's fingers and all enemies take some damage (to simulate a row of enemies being hit).

ScorchSlap.name: ScorchSlap
ScorchSlap.desc: With their hand imbued in flames, the user slaps the target. Very low chance to burn.

Crysp.name: Crysp
Crysp.desc: A more powerful version of Agi, but higher cost and no burns.

Dry.name: Dry

FireDance.name: Fire Dance
FireDance.desc: Inflicts moderate Fire damage 2-5 times on a random enemy

Agiverse.name: Agiverse
Agiverse.desc: The user employs an orange aura around the foes to double LB% gained.

FirePledge.name: Fire Pledge

ToastedSands.name: Toasted Sands

Abyss.name: Abyss

MolotovToss.name: Molotov Toss

Ralagilao.name: Ralagilao
Ralagilao.desc: Medium fire damage to one random target.

FlarePunch.name: Flare Punch
FlarePunch.desc: The user imbues their fist with flame, and strikes the opponent. Very low chance to burn.

FireSquare.name: FireSquare
FireSquare.desc: The user summons a simple fire square to burn the enemy.

MortemFlames.name: Mortem Flames
MortemFlames.desc: The user fires a green flame at the foe, with a chance to burn them.

PSIFire-Beta.name: PSIFire-Beta
PSIFire-Beta.desc: Fire bursts from the user's fingers and all enemies take moderate damage (to simulate a row of enemies being hit).

EAgidyne.name: EAgidyne
EAgidyne.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal heavy Fire damage

MarEAgidyne.name: MarEAgidyne
MarEAgidyne.desc: Purchase this DLC to deal multiple heavy Fire damage

TriFluch.name: TriFluch
TriFluch.desc: The user delivers three quick punches into an opponent with their fists cloakednin flames. Has a very low chance of causing a burn.

FireHexagon.name: FireHexagon
FireHexagon.desc: The user summons a simple fire hexagon to burn the enemy.

Cryspen.name: Cryspen
Cryspen.desc: A more powerful version of Agilao, but it has a higher cost and no burn chance.

Dryle.name: Dryle
Dryle.desc: A more powerful version of Maragion, but with a higher cost and no burn chance.

Fireburst.name: Fireburst
Fireburst.desc: A Direct upgrade for Fire Ball! Summoning a rather large ball of flames in the user hands, they chuck it towards their target! The Chance of burning is a bit low.

TorturedFlames.name: Tortured Flames
TorturedFlames.desc: The user uses the flames of a tortured past to cause some moderate damage, but causes a burn more often than a normal fire move.

FireFang.name: Fire Fang
FireFang.desc: The user imbues flames into their fangs and bite into the target. Has a moderate chance to burn the target.

PSIFire-Sigma.name: PSIFire-Sigma
PSIFire-Sigma.desc: Fire bursts from the user's fingers and all enemies take major damage (to simulate a row of enemies being hit).

MonkeyBomb.name: Monkey Bomb

FlameStrike.name: Flame Strike
FlameStrike.desc: A Direct Upgrade from Flamethrower! Kicking up a large flame, the user kicks it towards the target! Yet still a low chance of Burning the target.

InfernalFlames.name: Infernal Flames
InfernalFlames.desc: Deal heavy Fire damage to allies and enemies

Ralagidyne.name: Ralagidyne
Ralagidyne.desc: Heavy fire damage to one random target.

Fire-Tornado.name: Fire-Tornado
Fire-Tornado.desc: Summon a whirling wall of flames to envelop your enemy in.

Overheat.name: Overheat

PSIFire-Omega.name: PSI Fire

FlameTornado.name: Flame Tornado

FlamingFist.name: FlamingFist

ConflagrationPummel.name: Conflagration Pummel
ConflagrationPummel.desc: The user heavily strikes the opponent while imbued in flames. Very low chance to burn.

BlueFlare.name: Blue Flare
BlueFlare.desc: The user spreads a blue fire in an attempt to burn the foe.

Crysplan.name: Crysplan
Crysplan.desc: A more powerful version of Agidyne, but has a higher cost and no burn chance.

FlareLaser.name: Flare Laser
FlareLaser.desc: The user fires a laser of fires at the foe.

Drylot.name: Drylot

Dryolda.desc: A more powerful version of Maragilonda, but more costly and no burn chance.

Inferno.name: Inferno

Cryspendo.name: Cryspendo
Cryspendo.desc: A more powerful version of Inferno, but more costly and no burn chance.

Dryeldo.name: Dryeldo
Dryeldo.desc: A more powerful version of BlazingHell, but more costly and no burn chance.

DumbassDrain.name: Dumbass Drain
DumbassDrain.desc: Used only for Charfuck, hopefully. Whenever the person who has this gets hit by a magic attack, the enemy recovers 50HP.

DiminishingLife.name: Diminishing Life
DiminishingLife.desc: The user takes damage equal to 13% of their maximum HP every turn

FlowSense.name: FlowSense
FlowSense.desc: Allow the user to dodge magical attacks 10% of the time while moving with the flow.

PogoDodge.name: PogoDodge
PogoDodge.desc: With this passive you can pogo your way out of physical attacks 20% of the time.

Flowendla.name: Flowendla
Flowendla.desc: A more powerful version of Hydrouken, but more costly and no added bonuses.

Wavendla.name: Wavendla
Wavendla.desc: A more powerful version of Flood Field, but more costly and no added bonuses.

LonelyKick.name: LonelyKick
LonelyKick.desc: The user jumps and quickly kicks the foe with enough strength to confuse the foe's senses, sometimes enough to inflict dizziness on the foe. Due to the amount of space this skill requires it's more effective when the user is alone or the last one standing.

SpreadWings.name: SpreadWings
SpreadWings.desc: The user spreads their wings and slashes the foes with them to deal Heavy Slashing damage.

Intelligence.name: Intelligence
Intelligence.desc: The user uses their intelligence to strike the foe hard psychokinetically. This skill uses the user's intelligence stat to deal damage.

Psioverse.name: Psioverse
Psioverse.desc: The user deploys a psychic field in which foes within are trapped in a healing aura for 3 turns. All non-melee attacks from the user or their allies will heal them for 60% of the damage they deal.

FrailWill.name: FrailWill
FrailWill.desc: The user will have a 30% chance to stop attacking with a single-hit skill.

MindfulThinking.name: MindfulThinking
MindfulThinking.desc: The user will have a 10% chance to stop attacking with a single-hit skill.

TruePacifist.name: TruePacifist
TruePacifist.desc: The user will never attack with a single-hit skill.

Pacifist.name: Pacifist
Pacifist.desc: The user will have a 60% chance to stop attacking with a single-hit skill.

RegenContact.name: Regenerative Contact
RegenContact.desc: A passive skill that heals the attacker if they use a physical skill.

RegenRange.name: Regenerative Range
RegenRange.desc: A passive skill that heals the attacker if they use a magical skill.

Shockolda.name: Shockolda
Shockolda.desc: A more powerful version of Ziolonda, but more costly and no paralyze chance.

Zabsolda.name: Zabsolda
Zabsolda.desc: A more powerful version of Maziolonda, but more costly and no paralyze chance.

SpiritAssault.name: Spirit Assault
SpiritAssault.desc: Steal 75 MP from an enemy. Twice
